title: Link
description: A link to a related Zettel

accessed.description: The date and time the link was last accessed

created.description: The date and time the link was created

direction.description: The directionality of the link: 'undirected' (bi-directional) or 'directed' (uni-directional)

modified.description: The date and time the link was last modified

name.description: The name of the linked Zettel

uid.description: The unique identifier for the linked Zettel

uri.description: The URI of the linked Zettel
